title: CodeMirror Addons
label: Please select the addons you wish to load
feedback: Bug reports or suggestions are welcome at GitHub .
addon-codeFolding: Code folding
addon-codeFolding-mac: Code folding
addon-escape: Keyboard shortcuts for HTML/URL encoding
addon-escape-mac: Keyboard shortcuts for HTML/URL encoding
addon-highlightSelectionMatches: Highlight all matches of the selection
addon-openLinks: Open the link or transcluded page with CTRL-click
addon-openLinks-mac: Open the link or transcluded page with CMD-click
addon-save: Save your preferences on a [[special:mypage/codemirror-mediawiki.json|user subpage]]
addon-scrollPastEnd: Scroll down past the end of the document
addon-refHover: Hover over a predefined reference to see its content (CodeMirror) or go to its difinition (Monaco)
addon-useMonaco: Use Monaco Editor for new editors
welcome:
Welcome to CodeMirror-MediaWiki!
You can change your local settings here.
welcome-addons:
CodeMirror-MediaWiki has been upgraded to $1. This version introduces or upgrades $2 {{plural:$2|addon|addons}}:
    $3
You may update your local settings here.
phrase-Fold-template-or-extension-tag: Fold template, parser function or extension tag
